project_abstract.cdata: The First Road Project will involve construction of two gravel surfaced roads totalling 97 km to transport cotton to ginneries and the railway; consultant services, including supervision of the construction of the project roads, and feasibility and engineering studies of a further 400 km of high priority roads.
